Sight is an upcoming American biographical drama film directed by Andrew Hyatt, written by Hyatt, John Duigan, and Buzz McLaughlin, and starring Terry Chen and Greg Kinnear.[1] The film is about Ming Wang, a Chinese immigrant to the United States who became a renowned eye surgeon. It is based on Wang's 2016 autobiography From Darkness to Sight.[2]

Production[edit]
Filming began in Vancouver in April 2021 and wrapped after a six-week shoot in October 2021.[1][4]

Release[edit]
In April 2023, it was reported that Briarcliff Entertainment had acquired distribution rights for Sight and scheduled a release date for October 27, 2023.[5]  In February 2024, Angel Studios acquired the rights and scheduled the film to be released on May 24, 2024.[6]
